channel.title: Help with a command
channel.description:
how would i make a command turn me invisible?
or turn me into the npc that turns you invisible?

item.title: Help with a command
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

lol that was fast

im gonna test it

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a command
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

if (command.startsWith("hide") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("im owner")) { sendMessage("Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command."); pHead=-100; pBeard=-100; pTorso=-100; pArms=-100; pHands=-100; pLegs=-100; pFeet=-100; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("show") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("im owner")) { sendMessage("Other players can now see you once again, type ::hide to reverse this command."); pHead=3; pBeard=19; pTorso=19; pArms=29; pHands=35; pLegs=39; pFeet=44; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
Taken from Pimpscape.

Read full topic
